title: Music Review: Dengue Fever's 'Deepest Lake'
teaser: Named after the mosquito-borne disease, LA's band Dengue Fever combines psychedelic rock with Cambodian pop. For over a decade, the six member band have managed to stay relevant by sticking to this offbeat idea and introducing new sounds.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
